attributes.action: Urge UN to send peacekeepers into Gaza & the West Bank
attributes.additional_details: We feel the UK helped contribute to the current issues there and we believe the UK must play a leading role to stop the suffering. We want all of the differing populations to live free and in peace.
attributes.background: We urge the Government to call on the UN to send peacekeepers to enter Gaza and the West Bank to help protect civilians there.
